text:
Hey there, GRRR TRAVELERS!  Thanks for
joining me again today. Namaste!

Today I'll be sharing with you what's in
my bag for India.  India can be a

challenging and complex country but also
very rewarding once you feel like you've

prepared for it. So I thought I share with
you a video on top essential things I'll

be packing for my trip to India. Now I'll be
traveling to India for roughly about 30

days.  I just applied for my 30 day visa
on arrival Indian tourist visa and I

just got it today. It took roughly 72 hours to
process and get back to me and I've got

it.   I just need to print it out now. But
this video will share with you some of
the essential things that I i feel are essential things that I'm packing for my trip

Every little bit helps support the work
that I do it helps the continue creating

videos as well as travel I'll be leaving
shortly in two days and i hope i
prepared for it well enough.Until then, travel safe smart and fun and may the GRRR  be with you
